entry_requirements.visa_required_note: Indian citizens require a visa to enter Malaysia for tourism, business, or family visits, except for transit stays under 120 hours in certain cases.

visa_types.name: e-Visa (Tourist/Business)
visa_types.purpose: Tourism, short business visits, family travel
visa_types.note: Most popular visa type for Indian citizens

visa_types.name: eNTRI (Electronic Travel Registration & Information)
visa_types.note: For Indians only, must enter via direct flights from India

frequently_asked_questions.question: Can I extend my Malaysia e-Visa?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: No, extensions are not allowed for e-Visa or eNTRI.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Can I apply without travel history?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Yes, but a good financial statement is essential.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Can I enter Malaysia via Thailand or Singapore?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Only with e-Visa, not with eNTRI.

important_tips: Apply at least 7 days before travel to avoid delays
All documents must be uploaded in color and PDF/JPG format
eNTRI is only for Indians and requires direct flights from India
e-Visa allows entry from third countries, eNTRI does not
Extensions are not allowed for tourist visas
Always carry printed visa copy and supporting documents
